loans.name: Gulaiym

texts.ru:
Гулайым  48 лет, замужем. После распада Советского Союза, Гулайым была вынуждена оставить профессию преподавателя и заняться торговлей игрушками, сувенирными и канцелярскими товарами. Стартовав с суммой в 50,000 сом (KGS), Гулайым сумела развить свой бизнес с ежемесячным доходом в сумме около 30,000 сом.   
В целях расширения ассортимента товаров, Гулайым обратилась в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS).  Гулайым помогает сыну в постройке дома для семьи и планирует вложить часть доходов в помощь сыну, часть – в дальнейшее увеличение ассортимента товара.
texts.en: Gulaiym is 48 years old and married.  After the collapse of the Soviet Union, she was forced to leave her teaching profession and became involved in the sale of toys, souvenirs and office supplies.  With a starting sum of 50,000 som (KGS), she was able to develop her business, earning a monthly income of about 30,000 som.  In order to broaden her selection of goods, she has turned to "Bai Tushum & Partners" for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS).  Gulaiym is helping her son to build a house for the family, and she is planning to invest her revenues in part to help her son and in part to further increase her selection of goods.

loans.use: to broaden her selection of goods.

loans.name: Rasim

texts.ru: Rasim uje 11 let kak imeyet svayo kafe. On nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit novuyu pasudu dlya svoyego kafe. Rasim jenat i imeyet 3 detey. On yavlyayetsya IDP personom (Внутренне перемещённое лицо (ВПЛ) - человек, который был вынужден внезапно бежать из своего дома в результате вооружённого конфликта, насилия, нарушений прав человека, стихийных бедствий или других катастроф, но, в отличие от беженца, не перешел международную границу и находящийся на территории собственной страны (источник: Управления ООН по Координации Гуманитарных Вопросов)) pereselenec iz Fuzuli goroda, seychas projivayet v Fuzuli regione vmeste so svoimi lubimimi detmi i jenoy. Rasim 50 let. On ochen userdno rabotayet chtobi soderjat svoyu semyu. On xochet razvit svoy bizness i uvelichit svoi mesachniye doxodi.
texts.en:
Rasim has been running his own cafe for eleven years already. He needs 2,000 AZN to buy new dishware for his cafe. Rasim is married and has three chidlren. He is an IDP (internally displaced person) – someone who has been forced to suddenly flee from his home because of an armed conflict, violence, human rights violations, natural disasters or other catastrophes, but unlike refugees has not crossed an international border and is inside the territory of his own country (source: UN Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs).

He has been relocated from the town of Fuzuli and now lives in the Fuzuli region together with his beloved wife and children. Rasim is 50 years old. He works very diligently to support his family. He wants to expand his business and increase his monthly income.

loans.use: to purchase new dishware for the cafe.

loans.name: Kadzo

texts.en: Kadzo is a 27-year-old single woman. She has 2 children, both enrolled in school. Kadzo operates a food stall business and sells her goods from home. Her primary customers are neighbors. She describes her greatest business challenge as competition from other food stall operators. Her highest monthly expenses are food and school fees. Kadzo will use this KES 10,000 loan to pay school fees. She rents a house that has neither electricity nor piped water and hopes to purchase a plot to build her own home in the future. Kadzo joined Yehu to access capital.

loans.use: to pay school fees.

loans.name: Maria Natalia

texts.es:
María Natalia es una madre de familia de 34 años de edad, reside junto a su esposo y a sus 04  hijos en el caserío Luchadores Sociales, una zona rural del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona de clima tropical caracterizado por la producción de frutas como el mango y el limón. La zona se encuentra ubicada en la región Piura, a cinco horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.
La actividad que desarrolla es la venta de chicha, cerveza y comida, ella atiende todos los días de la semana a clientela conocida, además cría animales menores, ovino y aves de corral, en la parte posterior de su domicilio. Su esposo trabaja en una empresa Agro-industrial de la zona, entre ambos siempre tratan de mantener la economía de su familia del mejor modo posible, ambos tienen una relación bastante armómica.
María desea adquirir insumos para la elaboración de chicha de jora y realizar mejoras en su hogar, esta inversión le permitirá seguir creciendo en su negocio y así mejorar su calidad de vida. Para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 3000 nuevos soles. 
Ella ya ha tenido créditos con Edpyme Alternativa en el pasado y ha demostrado ser una cliente bastante responsable y puntual con sus pagos.
texts.en:
María Natalia is a 34-year-old mother living with her husband and four children in the Luchadores Sociales hamlet, a rural zone in the agricultural Tambogrande District which has a tropical climate characterized by fruit production like mangoes and lemons.  The zone is located in Piura Region, five hours from the city of Chiclayo, Lambayeque Region’s capital.

María sells chicha [corn-based beverage], beer and food.  She works every day of the week tending to known customers.  She also raises small farm animals like sheep and barnyard fowl in her back yard.  Her husband works for an Agro-Industrial firm in the zone.  Between the two of them they try to maintain the family’s economy the best way possible.  They have quite a harmonious relationship with each other.

María wants to acquire ingredients to make chicha de jora and to do some home improvements.  This investment will help her continue to grow in her business and thus improve her quality of life.  To reach this objective she’s deemed it advisable to request a 3000 new sol loan from Edpyme Alternativa.  She’s had prior loans with Edpyme Alternativa and has shown herself to be responsible and punctual with her payments.

loans.use: to purchase ingredients and to make some home improvements.

loans.name: Justina

texts.es:
Justina es una madre de familia de 57 años de edad, vive junto a su esposo y a su menor hijo en el caserío San Eloy, una zona rural del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona de clima tropical caracterizado por la producción de frutas como el mango y el limón. La zona se encuentra ubicada en la región Piura, a cinco horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.
Justina es comerciante, ella vende ropa, productos de primera necesidad y además ganado menor y aves de corral, los cuales cría en la parte posterior de su domicilio, con los ingresos que le brinda esta actividad ayuda a su esposo con el sostenimiento de la economía familiar.
Ella desea adquirir mercadería para surtir su negocio, además desea adquirir alimentos balanceados para el engorde de sus animales para venderlos a un mejor precio en el mercado local, esta inversión le permitirá seguir creciendo en su negocio y así mejorar su calidad de vida. Para lograr su objetivo, ella ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1000 nuevos soles con los cuales piensa lograr su objetivo.
Ella ya ha tenido créditos con Edpyme Alternativa en el pasado y ha demostrado ser una cliente bastante responsable y puntual con sus pagos.
texts.en:
Justina, 57, is a mother living with her husband and minor son in San Eloy, a rural zone of the agricultural Tambogrande District which has a tropical climate characterized by the production of fruit like mangoes and lemons.  The zone is located in Piura Region, five hours from the city of Chiclayo, Lambayeque Region’s capital.

Justina is a merchant; she sells clothes, basic staples and also minor farm animals and barnyard fowl that she raises in her back yard.  With income from this activity she helps her husband support the family economy.

She wants to acquire merchandise to stock her business and also nutritionally balanced animal feed to fatten up her animals and sell them at a better price at the local market.  This investment will allow her to continue to grow in her business thus improving her quality of life.  To reach her objective, she has deemed it advisable to request a 1000 new sol loan from Edpyme Alternativa.  She’s had loans with Edpyme Alternativa in the past and has shown herself to be quite a responsible, punctual client with her payments.

loans.use: to buy merchandise and animal feed.

loans.name: Consuelo

texts.es: Consuelo es socia del Banco Comunal Renacer, tiene 52 años de edad, se dedica a la venta de comida, gracias a los préstamos que le da Finca saco adelante a su familia y su negocio, también llegó a construir su casa, esta orgullosa por que con su esfuerzo esta logrando muchas cosas como sacar adelante a sus hijos, le gusta mucho las reuniones y las capacitaciones porque aparte de distraerse se fortalece con las charlas que le dan, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en compra de víveres para la elaboración de su comida.
texts.en: Consuelo is a member of the communal bank "Renacer."  She is 52 years old, and has a business selling food.  Thanks to the loans provided by FINCA, she has been able to make progress with her family and her business.  In addition, she has been able to build her house.  She is proud, because with her hard work, she is achieving many things, including helping her children to get ahead.  She enjoys the meetings and training she gets at FINCA very much, because in addition to being entertaining, the talks that are provided have strengthened her as a businesswoman.  She will invest this loan to purchase ingredients to make her food.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to make food to sell

loans.name: Dayanat

texts.ru: Dayanat jenat i imeyet 3 detey. Yemu 36 let. Dayanat yavlyayetsya IDP personom ( Внутренне перемещённое лицо (ВПЛ) - человек, который был вынужден внезапно бежать из своего дома в результате вооружённого конфликта, насилия, нарушений прав человека, стихийных бедствий или других катастроф, но, в отличие от беженца, не перешел международную границу и находящийся на территории собственной страны (источник: Управления ООН по Координации Гуманитарных Вопросов))on pereyexal iz Fuzuli goroda, seychas projivayet v Fuzuli regione vmeste so svoyey semyoy. Dayanat uje 7 let kak imeyet etot magazin dge prodayet televizori i stoli pod telefizori. Dayanat nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit novix tovarov(televizori, dvd i t.d) dlya  prodaji.
texts.en: Dayanat is married and has three children. He is 36 years old. Dayanat is an internally displaced person (IDP). An IDP is someone who had been forced to suddenly leave their home due to an armed conflict, violence, human rights abuse, natural disasters or other catastrophes, but unlike a refugee did not cross international borders and resides in their own country as defined by the UN Commission on Coordinating Humanitarian Issues. Dayanat arrived from Fuzuli city and lives in the Fuzuli region together with his family. Dayanat has been managing a TV and TV furniture store. He needs a loan of 2000 AZN to purchase additional TVs as well as DVDs etc. for sale in his store.

loans.use: to purchase goods for sale

loans.name: Ubando

texts.es:
Ubando es un padre de familia de 40 años de edad, reside junto a su esposa y a sus 03  hijos en uno de los caseríos del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona de clima tropical caracterizado por la producción de frutas como el mango y el limón. La zona se encuentra ubicada en la región Piura, a cinco horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.
La actividad que desarrolla el titular es la agricultura y ganadería, cuenta con más de 3 años de experiencia en el manejo de sus negocios, con estas actividades se encarga de sacar adelante a su familia. Su esposa suele apoyarle en las actividades que realiza.
Ubando desea adquirir fertilizantes para su cultivo de limón, además desea comprar alimentos balanceados para el engorde de su ganado y así poderlos vender a un mejor precio en el mercado local. Esta inversión le permitirá seguir creciendo en su negocio y así mejorar su calidad de vida. Para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles. El ya ha tenido créditos con Edpyme Alternativa en el pasado y ha demostrado ser un cliente bastante responsable y puntual con sus pagos.
texts.en:
Ubando, 40, is a father living with his wife and three children in one of the hamlets in the agricultural district of Tambogrande, a zone with a tropical climate characterized by fruit production like mangoes and lemons.  The zone is located in Piura Region five hours from the city of Chiclayo, Lambayeque Region’s capital.

Ubando is a farmer and raises livestock.  He has more than three years’ experience running his businesses.  With these activities he’s able to support his family.  His wife tends to support his activities.

Ubando wants to buy fertilizer for his lemon crops and also wants to buy nutritionally balanced feed for his livestock so that they will sell for better prices at the local market.  This investment will allow him to continue growing in his business and thus improve his quality of life.

To reach his objective he’s asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new sol loan.  He’s had loans with Edpyme Alternativa in the past and has proven to be quite a responsible, punctual client with respect to his payments.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and animal feed.

loans.name: Ysabel

texts.es:
Ysabel tiene 56 años de edad, es casada  y tiene un hijo a su cargo. Vive junto a su familia en el caserío Platillos, una zona rural del distrito agrícola de Tambogrande, una zona de clima tropical caracterizado por la producción de frutas como el mango y el limón. La zona se encuentra ubicada en la región Piura, a cinco horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.
Se dedica a la crianza de ganado vacuno, el cual le produce leche fresca para su venta diaria; también a la crianza de ganado ovino, porcino y pavos, los cuales al alcanzar tamaño y peso ideal los comercializa en el mercado local. Su esposo se dedica a la agricultura, cuenta con terreno propio en el cual siembra mango y algodón.
Ysabel desea adquirir alimentos balanceados para el engorde de sus animales y de ese modo venderlos a un mejor precio en el mercado local, del mismo modo aumentar la producción de sus vacas. Esta inversión le permitirá seguir creciendo en su negocio y así mejorar su calidad de vida. Para lograr su objetivo ha creído conveniente solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles.
Ella ya ha tenido créditos con Edpyme Alternativa en el pasado y ha demostrado ser una cliente bastante responsable y puntual con sus pagos.
texts.en:
Ysabel, 56, is married and has a son in her care.  She lives with her family in Platillos hamlet, a rural zone in the agricultural Tambogrande District which has a tropical climate good for fruit production like mangoes and lemons.  The zone is located in Piura Region five hours from the city of Chiclayo, Lambayeque Region’s capital.

She raises cattle which produce fresh milk to sell every day; she also raises sheep, pigs and turkeys which when they reach ideal size and weight are sold at the local market.  Her husband’s a farmer; he has his own parcel of land where he grows mangoes and cotton.

Ysabel wants to buy nutritionally balanced feed for her animals so that she can sell them at a better price in the local market and also increase her cows’ milk production.  This investment will allow her to continue growing in her business and thus improve her quality of life.  

To reach her objective she’s asked Edpyme Alternativa for a 2000 new sol loan.  She’s had Edpyme Alternativa loans in the past and she’s proven to be quite a responsible, punctual client with her payments.

loans.use: to purchase livestock feed.

loans.name: Dunuya

texts.ru:
Дунуе 53 года, замужем, воспитала троих детей. В поисках источника дохода для своей семьи, в 2002 году Дунуя начала свой бизнес в торговле продуктами питания. Стартовав с суммы 3,000 сом (KGS), Дунуя благодаря настойчивости  и упорному труду,  сумела развить свой бизнес  с ежемесячным доходом  5,000 сом (KGS). Товар в магазин Дунуя привозит с разных рынков, в том числе и ездит на закуп в город Ош, находящийся в 240 км.  
В целях дальнейшего развития своего бизнеса, Дунуя обратилась  в компанию «Бай – Тушум и Партнеры» за кредитом в сумме 100,000 сом (KGS) на расширение ассортимента.  Доходы от кредита Дунуя планирует вложить в  дальнейшее расширение своего бизнеса.
texts.en: Dunuya is 53 years old, married and has three children. In search of an income source for her family, Dunuya began her own grocery business in 2002. She started with 3000 som (KGS) and has since developed the grocery store into a striving business which yields 5,000 som (KGS) monthly using her hard work and perseverance. Dunuya brings her goods from various markets and also drives out to the city of Osh, which is 240 km/150 miles away to purchase inventory for her store. In order to expand her business, Dunuya has turned to "Bai-Tushum and partners" for a loan of 100,000 som (KGS) which she plans to use to expand her inventory. The profits from this expansion Dunuya will invest in further growing her business.

loans.use: to broaden her assortment of goods

loans.name: Paulina

texts.es: Paulina e social del Banco Comunal Renacer, tiene 36 años, es madre de 2 hijos, es socia  de FINCA Perú desde hace mas de 4 años, es conviviente, se dedica a la compra y venta de ganado, gracias a Finca compró su terreno lo cual era un sueño para ella y se siente orgullosa de ello, los préstamos que le dieron le ayudaron mucho para seguir adelante y poder educar sus hijos, dice que antes compraba y vendía solo en Huamanga y ahora ya hasta viaja a traer ganado fuera de Huamanga, le gusta Finca Perú porque le enseña a ahorrar su dinero y como invertir, el préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en su negocio comprará ganado, lo hace engordar y luego lo vende.
texts.en: Paulina is a member of the communal bank "Renacer."  She is 36 years old, and is the mother of 2 children.  She has been a member of FINCA Peru for more than 4 years.  She lives with a partner and has a business buying and selling cattle.  Thanks to FINCA, she bought some land, which was a dream of hers, and she feels proud about this.  The loans that she has been given have helped her to continue to make progress and educate her children.  She says that before, she used to buy and sell only in Huamanga, but now she travels to bring her livestock outside of Huamanga.  She likes FINCA Peru, because they taught her to how to save her money and invest.  The loan that she is requesting will be invested in her business; she will buy cattle to fatten and later sell.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Sadig

texts.ru: Sadig 26 let. On ne jenat i ne imeyet detey. Sadig uje 2 qoda kak zanimayetsya skotovodstvom i razvodit korov. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit korovi dlya razvitiya svoyego biznessa i uvelicheniya kolichestvo molochnogo produkta. Sadig yavlyayetsya IDP personom ( Внутренне перемещённое лицо (ВПЛ) - человек, который был вынужден внезапно бежать из своего дома в результате вооружённого конфликта, насилия, нарушений прав человека, стихийных бедствий или других катастроф, но, в отличие от беженца, не перешел международную границу и находящийся на территории собственной страны (источник: Управления ООН по Координации Гуманитарных Вопросов)) on bil pereselon iz Fuzul goroda, yego nineshneye mesto projianiya Fuzuli region posolok Makhmudlu vmeste so svoimi roditelyami.
texts.en:
Sadig is 26 years old. He is not married and does not have children. Sadig has been doing animal husbandry breeding cows for two years. Right now he needs 2,000 AZN to buy cows to grow his business and increase the amount of dairy production. Sadig is an IDP (Internally displaced person) – someone who was forced to suddenly free from their home because of an armed conflict, violence, human rights violations, natural disasters or other catastrophes, but unlike a refugee has not crossed an international border and is inside the territory of his own country (source: UN Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs).

He was relocated from the town of Fuzuli and now he lives with his parents in the Fuzuli region in a small town of Makhmudlu.

loans.use: to buy cows.

loans.name: Igor

texts.ru:
Игорь решил делать отопление в теплицах, но своих средств не хватает. Он просит предоставить кредит в сумме 15,000 гривен. С помощью отопления планирует получить ранний урожай и продать его по более выгодным ценам. В пршлый раз Игорь брал кредит на постройку новой теплицы для рассады.

Бизнес Игоря развивается отлично. Два года назад его годовой доход с огорода составлял всего 36 тыс гривен. Тогда он начал заниматься выращиванием овощей профессионально. Игорь стал садить хорошие дорогие сорта и применять новые удобрения. Его доход вырос почти в два раза. 

За счет прибыли Игорь поставил дома новый забор и ворота, сделал ремонт дома, отремонтировал машину.
texts.en:
Igor wants to install heating in his greenhouses, but he cannot finance the repairs himself. He is asking for a loan of 15,000 griven. Heated greenhouses will allow Igor to get his harvest faster and be able to sell it for a higher price. Previously Igor had taken out a loan to build a greenhouse addition for growing seedlings.

Igor's business has been expanding. Two years ago his annual farming profits were only 36,000 griven. Since that he has began growing vegetables on a professional scale by planting better, more expensive varieties and using new fertilizer mixes. As a result his annual profits doubled. Igor has used the profits to put a new fence and gate around his house, perform home improvements and repairs his car.

loans.use: to install heating in the greenhouses

loans.name: Tatyana

texts.ru:
Татьяна периодически пользуется бизнес кредитами, потому что считает их выгодными для поддержания своего бизнеса.  Впереди весна и женский празник 8 марта, перед ним еще будет День Святого Валентина. В такие дни люди покупают друг другу подарки. Вот поэтому Татьяна и хочет взять очередной кредит и наполнить свой магазинчик товаром.

Благодаря предыдущему кредиту Татьяна закупила много товара: кофточки, шерстяные блузы, шерстяные юбки и брюки, а также много другого. Полученную прибыль Татьяна использовала на свадьбу своей дочери.

Татьяна намерена развивать свой бизнес дальше. У Татьяны, есть своеобразный вкус на товар, который она закупает, благодаря этому она имеет много постоянных клиентов.
texts.en:
Tatyana uses Kiva loans on a periodic basis, because she finds them useful for maintaining her business. Spring is coming and with it International Women's Day on March 8th, as well as Valentines Day before it. During these holidays there are gift exchanges and Tatyana wants to take out this loan to purchase additional clothing for her store. 

Due to previous loans Tatyana has been able to purchase all kinds of inventory for her store: cardigans, wool jumpers, wool skirts and slacks as well as other things. Profits from previous loans Tatyana used to finance her daughter's wedding. In the future she is planing to further expand her business, since Tatyana has a certain sense of style and her regular customers enjoy her selection of clothing.

loans.use: to purchase additional goods before the holidays

loans.name: Virginia

texts.es: Virginia es socia del Banco Comunal Atinchik, es madre soltera de 1 hija, es socia de FINCA Perú desde hace mas de 3 años, es soltera, se dedica a la venta de ropa, gracias a Finca mejoró en su negocio, ahora vende al por mayor, también pudo sacar adelante a su hija lo cual está orgullosa porque está en la universidad, logró también aumentar su mercadería y lleva a vender a las ferias, también reparte al  por mayor en las ferias, le gusta las reuniones porque le ayuda a mejorar en su negocio y en su familia lo pone en práctica.El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá viajando a Lima y comprará más mercadería como uniformes, útiles escolares, y otros para llevar a las ferias y venderlas.
texts.en:
Virginia is a member of the Atinchik Communal Bank. She is a single mother with one daughter and has been a member of FINCA Perú for 3 years. She sells clothing and thanks to FINCA she has improved her business. Now she sells wholesale and was able to move her daughter ahead. She is proud because her daughter is attending the university.

Virginia also expanded her inventory of goods and takes them to sell at street markets, where she distributes them wholesale. She enjoys the meetings of her bank because they help her make improvements in her business and in her family since she puts what she learns into practice. She will invest the loan she is requesting in a trip to Lima where she will buy more merchandise such as uniforms, school supplies and other items to take to the street markets to sell.

loans.use: to purchase school uniforms.

loans.name: Tamara

texts.ru: Тамара занимается выращиванием ранних овощей. Она имеет многолетний опыт, налаженный сбыт товара и главное - желание трудится и развиваться дальше. Она просит предоставить ей кредит в размере 15,000 гривен для закупки семян и постройки новой теплицы. Тамара надеется получить дополнительный доход, что поможет ей содержать свою большую семью - трое детей, которых она растит сама.
texts.en: Tamara grows early vegetables for sale. She has had years of experience and optimized sales strategies and, most importantly - willingness to work and expand further. She would like to take out a loan of 15,000 griven to purchase seeds and build another greenhouse. Tamara wants to get additional profits from this venture which will allow her to support her large family - three children whom she is raising on her own.

loans.use: to purchase seeds and build a new greenhouse

loans.name: Fuzuli

texts.ru: Fuzuli yavlayetsya IDP personom( Внутренне перемещённое лицо (ВПЛ) - человек, который был вынужден внезапно бежать из своего дома в результате вооружённого конфликта, насилия, нарушений прав человека, стихийных бедствий или других катастроф, но, в отличие от беженца, не перешел международную границу и находящийся на территории собственной страны (источник: Управления ООН по Координации Гуманитарных Вопросов))on pereselenec iz Fuzuli goroda, seychas projivayet  v Fuzuli regione vmeste so svoyey lubimoy semyoy. On jenat i imeyet 4 detey. Fuzuli 57 let. On imeyet svoy magazin uje 12 let. Seychas on nujdayetsya v 2000 AZN chtobi kupit pisheviye produkti dlya prodaji, i razvitiya svoyego biznessa dlya uvelicheniya svoix mesachnix doxodov tak kak on imeyet bolshuyu semyu.
texts.en:
Fuzuli is an internally displaced person (IDP) from the city of Fuzuli and now lives in the Fuzuli region with his loving family.  He is 57 years old, married, and has four children.  He has been owning a store for 12 years already.  He currently needs 2,000 AZN to buy food products for resale. His goal is to develop his business and increase his monthly revenues, since he has a large family.

An internally displaced person (IDP) is a person, who was forced to suddenly flee his home as a result of a military conflict, violence, violation of human rights, natural disasters or other catastrophes, but what differentiates him from a refugee is the fact that did not cross an international border and is located on the territory of his own country (source: United Nations Office for the Coordination of Humanitarian Affairs).

loans.use: to buy food products.

loans.name: Pilar Nelly

texts.es: Pilar es socia del Banco Comunal Atinchik, tiene 30 años, es madre de 1 hijo, ya viene siendo socia más de 1 año, es soltera, está en Finca Perú por invitación de su mamá, se dedica a la venta de cosméticos de Natura, Ebel por catálogo, estando en Finca Perú aprendió a como vender más, ella dice que expone sus productos en su tienda y así vende más, gracias a Finca logró ahorrar su dinero y educar a su hijo, y sacar adelante a su familia, con los préstamos que le da Finca y con la facilidad que le dio pudo mejorar su negocio y con las capacitaciones que le motivan mas para mejorar. El préstamo que solicita lo invertirá en implementar su tienda y comprar mas productos y exponer para a atraer a los cliente dice que también comprará mostradores para exponer los productos.
texts.en:
Pilar is a member of the "Atinchik" communal bank. She is 30, and the mother of one child. She has been a member for more than a year now, and joined Finca Perú at her mother's invitation. She sells Natura and Ebel cosmetics by catalog. By being in Finca Perú, she has learned how to sell more.

She says that she displays her products in her store, and sells more this way. Thanks to Finca, she has managed to save her money, raise her son, and help her family get ahead in life. 

With the loans that Finca gives her, and the easy terms, she was able to improve her business; and the training motivates her to improve more. With the loan she is applying for, she will invest in running her store and buying more products. She will also buy counters to display the products, in order to attract customers.

loans.use: To buy products and display counters.

loans.name: Dulce Cristal

texts.es: La señora Dulce se acerco con nosotros ya que inicio   un negocio  de  tienda  de  abarrotes y  necesita  capital  para  poder  invertir  y  brindar a  sus  clientes   un excelente   servicio, teniendo  disponibles  los  diferentes  productos   ya que  considera  que  esa  es  la  base  para  que  su negocio   cresca,  es por ello  que  esta  muy  contenta  de  habernos  encontrado  ya  que podrá  realizar  su proyecto, generando mayores  ingresos  y  esto le permitirá   brindar  a su  familia una excelente  calidad  de  vida.
texts.en: Dulce came to us because she started a retail business, a general store, and needs capital to invest and to offer her customers good service by having available a variety of products. She considers this to be the base from which her business will grow. That’s why she’s very happy to have found us as she will be able to realize her project: generate more income and this will permit her to offer her family an excellent quality of life.

loans.use: buy goods for her general store.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is 47 years old, married, and blessed with one child, who is 18. She owns a grocery shop that earns her a monthly income of 8,000 KES. Mary has been in this business for the past 7 years. She has requested a loan of 20,000 KES to buy fruits, vegetables, beans, maize, and charcoal. 

Mary's anticipated profits would help her repay her loan and expand her business. Her hope is to purchase a piece of land and settle in.

loans.use: to buy fruits, vegetables, beans, maize, and charcoal for her store.

loans.name: Carina

texts.es: Carina, de 40 es una mujer amable y buena, está separada y es madre de dos hijos de 20 Iván y 24 Lily, a quienes durante todo el tiempo a su lado les ha brindado educación y una crianza con buenos hábitos. Juntos viven en casa propia en donde todos aportan para la economía del hogar y así puedan tener una mejor calidad de vida. El negocio de Carina consiste en el alquiler de mototaxis, a diario van a su casa dos personas en busca de alquiler de sus dos unidades móviles para que trabajen como choferes, con documentos en regla y sobre todo que sean responsables. Lleva realizando este negocio por tres años y le ha permitido tener un ingreso adicional ya que también trabaja como personal administrativo en una municipalidad de la ciudad. Le esta yendo bien en su negocio y al mismo tiempo en su trabajo ya que percibe dos ingresos y eso le permite poder tener algunas comodidades en su hogar, y con ello apoyar a sus hijos quienes aún están estudiando y necesitan de bastantes materiales para poder realizar sus estudios de manera adecuada. Espera seguir con el negocio mas adelante y tener más vehículos. Este será el primer crédito con MFP, por tanto esta muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio, además esta muy comprometida en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Con el monto solicitado 800 soles, comprará piezas y repuestos para refaccionar sus vehículos que se encuentran deteriorados por el paso del tiempo.
texts.en:
Carina, 40, is separated, and is the mother of a son, Iván, 20 and a daughter, Lily, 24.  She is a good and friendly woman who has ensured that while her children have been with her, they have received education and were taught good habits.  They all live in their own house where they help with household expenses and that way can have a better quality of life.  Carina’s business is renting motor taxis.  Every day two people go to her house to rent the vehicles so that they can work as drivers. They have all their papers in order, and above all, are responsible. 

 She has had this business for three years and it has allowed her to have another source of income since she also works as an administrative employee in the town government.  Her business is going well and having two incomes permits her to have some comforts in her home.  With these she can support her children who are studying and need many things for their schooling.  She hopes to continue with the business in the future and to have more vehicles.  This will be her first loan with MFP and she is happy to know that she can have financial support and thus she will feel sure of the progress of her business.  She promises to make her payments on time and with the amount of 800 sols, she will buy new and replacement parts to fix up her vehicles that are wearing out as time passes.

loans.use: to buy replacement parts to fix up her vehicles

loans.name: Veronica

texts.en:
Veronica is a 36-year-old business lady, married to Samuel, a businessman. They are blessed with two children. Veronica has been running a greengrocer business for the past five years. She earns a monthly income of 10,000 KES, which she uses to support her family.

She is applying for her first loan with KADET LTD after being introduced to the company by KADET staff. Veronica will use the loan to buy fruits and green vegetables for her business. 

With the anticipated profit from the business, she will educate her children. Her hopes and dreams are to open a retail shop and continue with the grocery business.

loans.use: to buy fruits andgreen vegetables for her business.

loans.name: Heremine

texts.en:
Heremine is a widowed woman with two children between the ages of five and seven, both of whom are enrolled in school. Heremine operates a business selling broiler chickens from her home. She's worked in this business for two years, and her primary customers are neighbors and restaurant operators. She describes her greatest business challenge as high cost of transportation, and her highest monthly expenses are food and rent bills. She rents a house that has electricity but no piped water. 

Heremine will use the 12,725 KES loan to pay for medical insurance coverage. Heremine aspires to expand her business in the future. She joined Yehu because existing members were successful.

loans.use: to pay for medical insurance coverage.

loans.name: Jhon Henry

texts.es:
Jhon tiene 23 años de edad, reside junto a su esposa en el caserío Huaca Blanca, una localidad rural que se encuentra situada en el distrito de Tambogrande, una zona de clima tropical caracterizada por la producción de frutas como el mango y el limón. La zona se encuentra ubicada en la región Piura, a cinco horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque.
Se dedica a la crianza y venta de animales. El cuenta con gallinas y pavos, las cuales engorda para luego comercializarlos en el mercado del distrito. Adicionalmente comercializa limón, producto típico del distrito.
Jhon desea adquirir alimentos balanceados para engordar a sus animales, así como también desea realizar mejoras en sus corrales, para ello ha solicitado por primera vez a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 600 nuevos soles con los que planea lograr su objetivo y sacar adelante a su negocio.
 Jhon es un joven bastante trabajador y responsable, las personas que le conocen en la zona donde vive le tienen mucho cariño y estima.
texts.en:
Jhon is 23 years old.  He resides along with his wife in the country house "Huaca Blanca" [White Tomb], a rural location that can be found situated in the Tambogrande district, a tropical climate zone characterized by the production of fruits like mango and lime.  The zone is located in the Piura region, five hours from the city of Chiclayo, capital of the Lambayeque region. 
He raises and sells animals.  He depends on chickens and turkeys, which he fattens up to later sell in the district market.  In addition, he sells limes, a typical product of the district.
Jhon wants to obtain more balanced foods to fatten up his animals.  He also wants to make improvements to his corrals.  This is why he has asked for a loan of 600 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa for the first time.  With the money, he plans to reach his goal and move his business ahead.  Jhon is a  quite hardworking and responsible young man.  The people that know him in the zone where he lives have much affection and esteem for him.

loans.use: obtain balanced foods to fatten up his animals, as well as make improvements to the corrals.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en: Rose is taking out another Kiva loan of 25,000 KES. With the loan, she intends to pay school fees for her son, who is currently attending school. With the previous loan, she purchased sacks of fruits for making fruit juices and also bought spare parts for her lorry. Rose gives thanks to Kiva lenders and Yehu for improving her family living standards.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her son.

loans.name: Rajabu

texts.en:
Rajabu is a married man who operates a fruits and vegetables business, selling his goods at the market. He's worked in this business for two years. His primary customers are residents of his local area. Rajabu describes transportation as his greatest business challenge, and his highest monthly expense is food for his family. He owns a house that has electricity but no piped water. 

Rajabu will use the 30,000 KES loan to purchase more stock of carrots, mangoes, tomatoes, bananas, and onions for resale. Rajabu aspires to establish a fruits and vegetables supply business in the future. He joined Yehu to acquire capital to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase more grocery stock for resale.

loans.name: Samuel

texts.en:
Samuel is 30 years old and married with one child. He sells milk to earn a living; he has been in this business for eight years and has employed two people. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, Samuel has been able to save his income, and he hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for a loan of 80,000 KES to buy milk for sale.

loans.use: to buy milk for sale.

loans.name: Juana  Maria

texts.es: La señora  Juana es una persona trabajadora y responsable  que dia  con día se  preocupa  por  el  bienestar  de  su   familia, es  por ello  que  en esta  ocasión  ella  requiere    colocar  el piso en la  cochera  de  su  domicilio, ve  en  el crédito la posibilidad  de  brindar  a  su  familia una  excelente  comodidad , agradece el apoyo  brindado  para la realización de  su  proyecto.
texts.en: Juana is a responsible, hard-working person who worries day to day about the well-being of her family. That’s why on this occasion she wants to pave the driveway of her home. With this loan, she sees the possibility to offer her family more comfort. She’s grateful for the support provided for the realization of her project.

loans.use: pave her driveway.

loans.name: Hamisi

texts.en: Hamisi is a married man. He has two children. Hamisi operates a retail shop and sells his goods in the shop. He has worked in this business for two years. His primary customers are his neighbors. He describes his greatest business challenge to be transportation and his highest monthly expense is food for his family. He owns a house that has both electricity and piped water. Hamisi will use the Kes 20,000 loan to purchase more stocks of maize flour, wheat flour, rice, sugar, cooking oil and detergents to resell. Hamisi aspires to establish a wholesale shop in the future. He joined Kiva partner Yehu in order to acquire capital to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase more stock of maize flour, wheat flour, rice, sugar, cooking oil and detergents to resell.

loans.name: Everlyn

texts.en: Everlyn is a 32-year-old married woman. She has two children aged 10 and 12 and both are enrolled in school. Her husband's name is John Omondi and he works as a Hotelier. Everlyn operates a fish selling business and sells her goods as retail. She's worked in this business for ten years and was previously employed selling second hand clothes. Her business is located in a shopping center and her primary customers are neighbours and town dwellers. She describes her greatest business challenge to be the high cost of transportation and her highest monthly expense is food and school fees. She rents a house that has electricity but no piped water. Everlyn will use the Kes 50,000 loan to purchase bundles of fish. Everlyn aspires to expand and hire more employees in the future. She joined Kiva partner Yehu in order to access capital.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of fish.

loans.name: Petros

texts.en:
Petros is 44 years old. He lives in the Geghamavan village, in the Sevan area of Armenia, with his wife and two sons. His wife is jobless, and his sons are attending school. Petros is qualified as a mechanic and driver, and for several years he worked at a machine building plant as a welder. Since 2004, he has been a contract military man. 

In addition to his military service, Petros is engaged in farming. On his farm he breeds cows, calves, and sheep. He sells dairy products and meat to his neighbors and to re-sellers. Petros’s wife and elder son also provide for the family by helping him with the farm. 

Petros has received three loans from Nor Horizon, and his repayments have never been delayed. He is currently asking for a 1,000,000 AMD loan, which will help him to buy two more cows for his farm and to buy fodder for his farm animals.

loans.use: to buy two more cows and fodder for his farm animals.

loans.name: Ernestina Albertina

texts.es:
Ernestina tiene 51 años de edad, es  viuda y tiene dos hijos. Reside en el caserío Los Boliches, una zona rural del distrito de Olmos, una zona agrícola situada a más de hora y media al norte de la ciudad de Chiclayo, capital de la región Lambayeque. La zona se caracteriza por la producción de limón.
Se dedica desde hace más de cinco años a la venta de ropa de vestir. Ella suele realizar sus compras en la ciudad de Chiclayo. Usualmente trabaja en base a pedidos, aunque también cuenta con un stock permanente de productos. Este negocio le brinda los recursos que necesita para sacar adelante a su familia.
La creciente demanda por las prendas que ofrece ha hecho que tenga que adquirir más mercadería para poder satisfacer a su creciente clientela. Por ello se ha visto en la necesidad de solicitar a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 2000 nuevos soles que le permitan lograr su objetivo.
Ernestina ya ha tenido créditos con Edpyme Alternativa en el pasado y ha demostrado ser una cliente bastante responsable y puntual con sus pagos.
texts.en:
Ernestine is 51 years old and a widow with two sons. She lives in the small village of Los Boliches, a rural area in the district of Olmos. Olmos is an agricultural region located more than an hour and a half north of the city of Chiclayo, which is the capital of  Lambayeque. The area is known for its production of lemons. 

Ernestine has been selling clothes for more than five years. She usually makes her purchases in Chiclayo. Generally she takes catalog orders, although she also has a permanent inventory of products on hand. This business provides the income she needs to move her family forward.

A growing demand for the garments she sells has required her to acquire more merchandise to satisfy her growing clientele. Consequently, she needs to request a loan of 2,000 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa so that she can reach her objective.

Ernestine has  had other loans from Edpyme Alternative in the past and has shown herself to be a very responsible borrower who is punctual in her payments.

loans.use: Purchase seasonal apparel for resale

loans.name: Silvia Amparo

texts.es:
Silvia es una persona muy emprendedora que siempre se ha reconocido por ser muy trabajadora y siempre querer brindar un bienestar para su familia. Trabaja con su esposo en el negocio de hospedaje que montaron, donde ofrecen el servicio de hospedaje y alimentación a los conductores de tracto mulas que circulan por la carretera de su municipio. Silvia siempre ha querido que su negocio sea reconocido y por esto trabaja fuertemente con el ánimo de que crezca y se consolide en su región. Gracias a la buena atención que ofrecen en su hospedaje y restaurante, Silvia cuenta con un nivel de surtido de su restaurante muy bajo, por lo que quiere comprar productos de cafetería y restaurante que le permitan atender con buena cantidad de surtido a sus clientes. Sin embargo, Silvia no cuenta con el capital para realizar estas compras, es por esto que tiene la esperanza en que un préstamo le brindará la oportunidad de acceder a la compra de productos de cafetería como café, azúcar entre otros y la compra de productos de restaurante como son verduras, legumbres, entre otros, para poder así atender a sus clientes con mayor variedad de productos.

Silvia espera que su negocio siga creciendo para que le genere ingresos con los cuales pueda seguir sosteniendo los gastos de su hogar. Además, espera que sus 2 hijos puedan acceder a una educación de calidad y en un futuro puedan gozar de una estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Silvia is an enterprising person and has always been known for being a very hard worker who provides for the welfare of her family. She works with her husband in a hostel business that they established. They provide lodging and food services to tractor trailer drivers who travel along the highway in her town. Silvia has always wanted her business to become recognized, so she worked hard with the intention of growing and becoming the strongest in her region.

Thanks to the good service she offers in her hostel and restaurant, Silvia’s inventory level in her restaurant has greatly diminished. For this reason, she wants to buy cafeteria and restaurant products so that she can provide high-quality service to her customers. However, Silvia does not have the capital to make these purchases. She is hopeful that a loan will give her the opportunity to purchases cafe products such as coffee, sugar, and other items. In addition, she will buy restaurant supplies such as vegetables, legumes, and other items so that her customers can have a wide variety of products.

Silvia hopes that her business continues to grow so that she can generate income to maintain the household expenses. In addition, she hopes that her two children will have access to a quality education and have financial stability in the future.

loans.use: to purchase a variety of food products to serve to her customers.

loans.name: Braulio Alberto

texts.es: El señor Braulio es una persona que junto con su famila empezaran a construir  su  vivienda,  ellos  se preocupan  por  tener  un patrimonio, es  por  ello  que  requieren de  nuestra  ayuda  para  terminar   de  construir  un cuarto   ya que  nos  comenta  que  actualmente  ya  cuenta   con material  de  construcción   como ladrillos , pero   no  cuentan  con el  capital  suficiente  para  concluir   su  proyecto, toda  la  familia   Fuentes   esta   muy agradecida  por  el  apoyo   brindado para  la realización de su  proyecto.
texts.en: Braulio and his family are about to start building themselves a home, as they wish to be owners. This is why they need our help to finish building a room. They currently have construction materials like bricks, but they don’t have enough capital to finish their project. The Fuentes family is very grateful for the support they are given to realize their project.

loans.use: build a room in a house.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en: Ali is a married man. He has three children and all are enrolled in school. Ali operates a video show business. He's worked in this business for three years. His primary customers are the local area residents. He describes his greatest business challenge to be a lack of enough capital to expand his business and his highest monthly expense is food for his family. He owns a house that has electricity but no piped water. Ali will use the Kes 30,000 loan to purchase more movies and a new flat screen TV for his business. Ali aspires to establish a wholesale shop in the future. He joined Kiva partner Yehu in order to acquire capital to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase more movies and a new flat screen TV for his business.

loans.name: Charita

texts.es: Charita, de 39 años, es una mujer amable y muy trabajadora, al momento de quedarse como madre soltera no dudo ningún momento en trabajar en cualquier trabajo que se le presentaba, es así como esta sacando adelante a sus cuatro hijos, Ludin de 20, Ludger de 16, Alith de 14 y Merlis de 13 años. Juntos viven en su casa propia, y se esfuerza a diario para brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. La tienda de abarrotes de Charita siempre se encuentra abierto desde muy temprano, es por eso que sus múltiples clientes van en busca de algún articulo o producto de primera necesidad, por lo que Charita los atiende con su amplia sonrrisa y buen trato. Su negocio está ubicado en un espacio que acondiciono en su casa, trabajo que lo viene ejerciendo por más de 8 años. Ella se inició en éste trabajo debido a la necesidad de poder satisfacer las necesidades de sus hijos. Le gusta lo que hace pues no tiene que salir a ningún lado y desde ahí tiene el control de su hogar y puede apoyar en lo que necesiten sus hijos. Agradece mucho el apoyo que le brindan sus dos mayores hijos quienes están siempre a su lado para ayudarle algunas veces con la atención de los clientes. Ahora desea seguir trabajando mucho y poder ofrecer mayor variedad de productos a sus clientes. Este será el crédito número 4 con MFP, está muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá mas segura d avanzar con su negocio, por otro lado ella se compromete una vez mas a cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas de manera puntual ya que no desea quedar mal con su grupo. Con el monto solicitado 3000 soles, comprará productos y mercadería para poder ofrecer en mayor cantidad y variedad a sus clientes.
texts.en:
Charita, 39, is a friendly and very hardworking woman. The moment she was left a single mother, she did not have a single doubt that she would do any work necessary in order to move her four children forward. They are Ludin, 20, Ludger, 16, Alith, 14 and Merlis, 13. They live together in their own house and she tries every day to give them a better quality of life.

Charita’s grocery store is always open very early. Consequently she has many customers who come looking for some item or staple.  Charita waits on them with a wide smile and good service. Her business, which she has been engaged in for more than 8 years, is located in a space that she fixed up in her house. She started in this work because she had to meet her children’s needs. She likes what she does because she does not have to leave the premises and remains in control of her home and is there to help her children whenever they need her.  She is grateful for her two older children’s help. They are always at her side and sometime help wait on customers. 

Now she wants to continue working hard and to be able to offer a greater variety of products to her customers. This will be her fourth loan with MFP. She is very pleased to  know that she will have financial support since she will feel more confident of advancing in her business. She is committed once again to making her payments on time for she does not want to look bad to her group.. With the 3000 soles requested she will buy a greater quantity and variety of products and merchandise to offer her customers.

loans.use: to buy staples to stock her store.

loans.name: Abel

texts.es: El señor  Abel  es una persona responsable  y  muy trabajadora, la  cual se  preocupa  por  el  bienestar  de  su  familia,  con esfuerzo  día  con  día    logro  adquirir   su  vivienda   es  por ello  que  en esta  ocasión  requiere  impermeabilizar  el  techo  de   su  hogar  ya  que   nos comenta   que  en temporada  de lluvia  el   agua  entra  a su  domicilio ,ve  en el crédito  la posibilidad de  ofrecer  a su  familia una excelente   comodidad, agradece  el apoyo  brindado  para  la  realización de su proyecto
texts.en: Abel is a responsible, hard-working person who worries about the wellbeing of his family. With great effort, day by day, he was able to procure his home. That’s why, on this occasion, he needs to waterproof the roof of his home because during the rainy season, the rain drips into the house. With this loan, he sees the possibility to offer his family excellent comfort. He’s grateful for the support offered to realize his project.

loans.use: waterproof the roof of his house.

loans.name: Rose

texts.en:
Rose is 46 years-old, married and blessed with four children aged 28, 23, 20, and 18 years respectively. She owns a grocery shop that earns her a monthly income of KES 12,000. She has been in this business for 11 years. She has requested for a loan of KES 65,000 in order to buy fruits, vegetables, rice, beans and maize to sell.

The anticipated profit from her business would help buy more stock for her business. Rose’s hopes are to continue with her grocery business and to educate her children.

loans.use: to purchase fruit, vegetables, rice, beans and maize to sell.

loans.name: Karachi

texts.en: Karachi is taking out another Kiva loan of KES 50,000 in order to establish another business of selling coconuts. With the loan, she wants to purchase sacks of coconuts to resell. The previous loan had a lot of impact on her business and with the additional profit she is establishing another business of coconut selling. Her family living standards have improved greatly.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of coconuts to resell.

loans.name: Cheril

texts.es:
Cheril, de 28 años, es una mujer amable y muy buena, nunca huye a las situaciones puestas por el destino, es así que cuando se quedo como madre soltera no dudo ningún momento en trabajar mucho para poder brindar una mejor calidad de vida a sus dos hijos, Luis de 11 y Cesar de 2 años. Ahora ella vive en su casa propia junto a sus dos menores a quienes desea brindar educación y buenas enseñanzas. A diario, Cheril sale muy temprano de su hogar, va en busca de ingredientes e insumos para así poder preparar los deliciosos platos con los que deleita a diario a sus fieles comensales, al mismo tiempo que les ofrece un buen trato. Lleva realizando éste trabajo por tres año y durante este tiempo trabajó sola ya que no tiene ayuda alguna de ningún personal.
Le esta yendo muy bien, genera buenas ventas diarias y con lo mismo tiene buenos ingresos que son derivados a satisfacer las necesidades principales de sus hijos. Tiene muchas metas trazadas, una de ellas es la montar una tienda de abarrotes y otros artículos de primera necesidad y esta a la espera de un pequeño apoyo para iniciarlo. Este será el crédito número 2 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tendrá un préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos, por su parte se compromete a ser puntual en sus cuotas y así no quedar mal con el grupo al que pertenece ya que todos son muy responsables y muy buenos. Con el monto solicitado de 3000 soles, comprará ingredientes e insumos para continuar con su venta de comida, además de realizar las compras necesarias para empezar a montar tienda de abarrotes.
texts.en:
Cheril is a very kind and good 28-year-old woman. She never flees situations created by destiny, so when she was left as a single mother she didn’t doubt for a moment not to work hard to provide her 2 children, Luis, 11, and Cesar, 2, with a good quality of life. 
Now she lives in her own house with her children and wants to provide them both with an education and good teachings. Daily, Cheril leaves her house very early to look for ingredients to prepare the delicious dishes with which she wows her loyal clients, all the while providing good service. She’s been prepared food for 3 years and during this time she has worked alone, without any employees. It’s going very well for her, she generates good daily sales and has a good income that she uses to provide the basic necessities to her children. She has many planned goals and one of them is to start a grocery store and have other first need articles and she’s waiting for a little help to begin. This will be her 2nd loan with MFP. She’s very happy to know she will be given a loan so she can meet her objectives. On her part, she promises to be punctual with her payments so as not to let down the group she’s a part of, as they’re all responsible and good people. With this loan, she’ll buy ingredients and materials to continue her food sales and also buy the products needed to start her grocery store.

loans.use: buy ingredients to prepare food and buy products for the grocery store she wants to open.

loans.name: Angelina

texts.en: Angelina is a 60-year-old married woman. She has six children between the ages of 24 and 39. Her husband's name is Shadrack. Angelina operates a second-hand clothes selling business and sells her goods at the market. She's worked in this business for one year and was previously employed as a teacher. Her business is located in a shopping center, and her primary customers are town dwellers. She describes her greatest business challenge to be delayed payments by debtors. Her highest monthly expense is food and rent bills. She rents a house that has electricity but no piped water. Angelina will use the 12,725-Kenyan-shilling loan to pay for her medical insurance coverage. Angelina aspires to establish a boutique in the future. She joined Yehu because of the availability of sustainable financial services.

loans.use: to pay for her medical insurance

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is 33 years old, married and a father of four children.  The children are 10, seven, and one year old, as well as a four-month-old baby. John sells clothes.  He started his business in 2009; it earns him a monthly income of KES 20,000. He has requested a loan of KES 25,000 which he will use to buy two bales of secondhand clothes for sale.

The profit from his business will help him expand his business. His dream is to have a good job and educate his children.

loans.use: To buy two bales of secondhand clothes for sale

loans.name: Maura Cecilia

texts.es:
En el municipio de Quezalguaque en León, la señora Maura se ha desempeñado como maestra de primaria desde hace 23 años habiendo adquirido muchísima experiencia en este trabajo ya que le apasiona mucho enseñar a los niños. Ella es casada y con 3 hijos al que tiene que proporcionarle las condiciones necesarias para sus estudios.

Doña Maura atraviesa una dificultad y es que  requiere de una cantidad de dinero para apoyar a su hija con los gastos de profesionalización académica, por lo que ha tomado la decisión de acudir a Ceprodel para solicitar un crédito para poder cumplir sus sueños que como todo buen padre quiere lo mejor para sus hijos, de apoyarlos académicamente y que mejor siendo beneficiado por ceprodel.
texts.en:
In the municipality of Quezalguaque in León, Sra. Maura has worked as an elementary school teacher for 23 years. She has acquired a wealth of experience in this line of work and is very passionate about teaching children. Maura is married and has three children who she must provide the necessary conditions for their studies.

Doña Maura is experiencing some difficulty and is requesting a loan to assist her daughter with her professional education expenses. For this reason, she decided to approach CEPRODEL in order to request a loan to help her daughter fulfill her dreams. Like any good parent, Maura wants to provide the best for her children and support them academically. She feels the best way to achieve these benefits is through CEPRODEL.

loans.use: to pay for her daughter's nursing studies.

loans.name: Samwel

texts.en:
Samwel is 50 years old, a carpenter in Mombasa, he is a married father of one. He has been making furniture for sale with great success for the past twelve years.

This marks his second borrowing from KADET LTD to finance his business. He plans to purchase nails, timber and a jack plane. He will use the anticipated profits to pay for his child’s school fees and repay his loan. 

He hopes to have a well established carpentry business.

loans.use: to purchase nails, timber and a jack plane.

loans.name: Luis Manuel

texts.es:
El trabajo que este señor ejerce  requiere de mucho sacrificio y seguimiento en la búsqueda de mejorar  la  salud para la población ya que pertenece a la brigada Técnica de Salud en el programa de Enfermedades Trasmitidas por Vectores y Roedores,  Consciente de esto,  El señor Luis  se dedica a laborar como Responsable de Programa en el municipio de Telica  con 25 años de ejercerla atendiendo las diferentes comunidades del municipio de telica y cuya preocupación principal es de controlar la proliferación de Enfermedades  en estas personas incluyendo niños.
El acude a Ceprodel porque requiere solicitar un crédito para el pago de Módulos universitarios de sus 3 hijos en ese nivel académico,  ya que como todo buen padre quiere lo bueno para sus hijos y solo con la ayuda de ceprodel puede lograr ese sueño.
texts.en:
The work this man does requires a lot of sacrifice and follow up, as he seeks to improve his community's health. He belongs to the Health Technician brigade in the program called Illnesses Transmitted by Vectors and Rodents.  

Luis is aware of this, as the person in charge of the program in the municipality of Telica. He has done this work for 25 years, serving the various communities in the municipality of Telica. His main concern is controlling the spread of illness in the population, including among children. 

He is approaching Ceprodel, because he needs to apply for a loan to pay for university courses for his three children who are at that academic level.  As every good parent does, he wants what is best for his children, and only with Ceprodel's help can he realize that dream.

loans.use: To pay for university courses for his three children at that level.

loans.name: Mwanajuma

texts.en: Mwanajuma is a married woman. She has 1 child. Her husband works as a casual laborer. Mwanajuma operates a tailoring business and offers her services from home. She has worked in this business for 2 years. Her primary customers are her neighbors. She describes her greatest business challenge to be seasonality and her highest monthly expense is food for her family. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Mwanajuma will use the KES 10,000 loan to purchase another sewing machine for her business. Mwanajuma aspires to expand her business in the future. She joined Yehu because it offers quality financial services.

loans.use: To purchase another sewing machine for her business.

loans.name: Chizi

texts.en: Chizi is a 28-year-old married woman. She has nine children, and four are enrolled in school. Her husband's name is Hassan, and he works as a Matatu operator. Chizi operates a vegetable-stall business and sells her goods at the market. She's worked in this business for six years. Her business is located in a shopping center, and her primary customers are town dwellers and passersby. Chizi's other source of income includes her husband's earnings. She describes her greatest business challenge to be competition from other vegetable-stall operators. Her highest monthly expense is food and school fees. She rents a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Chizi will use the 20,000-Kenyan-shilling loan to purchase sacks of tomatoes at a wholesale price and sell them at a retail price. Chizi aspires to expand her vegetable-stall business in the future. She joined Yehu to access capital.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of tomatoes at a wholesale price and sell them at a retail price

loans.name: Ziborah

texts.en: Ziporah has a good history with KADET LTD. She owns a grocery shop that earns a monthly income of 5,000 Kenyan shillings (KES). She has requested a loan of 15,000 KES to buy fruits, vegetables, and maize for sale. The anticipated profit from her business would help her increase her stock. Ziporah's hope is to work hard and earn more profit to expand her business.

loans.use: to add more stock for resale, such as tomatoes, fruits, and assorted vegetables

loans.name: Morris

texts.en:
Morris is 42 years old and owns a retail shop in Mariakani. He is married. He has been running the shop successfully for the past twelve years. 

This is his third borrowing from KADET LTD to finance his business. He plans to purchase sugar, tea leaves, and rice. He will use the proceeds to repay his loan and expand his business further. 

He hopes to have a happy and successful family.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, tea leaves, and rice.

loans.name: Diana

texts.es:
Diana, de 39 años, es una mujer trabajadora y emprendedora, es conviviente con Dedmer de 49 años con quien es madre de dos menores hijos, Jimena de 14 y Herber de 6 años, quienes son su principal motivo para segur trabajando y brindarles una calidad de vida. Juntos viven en su casa propia, inmueble que logró comprar a base de esfuerzo y sacrificio. Diana trabaja mucho en su negocio, hace 3 años que se dedicaba en vender comida de manera ambulante, pero la necesidad aumento así que decidio incursionar en la de tener un puesto de venta de comida, es así que compró mejores ingredientes, carnes fresca, mesas sillas y acondicionó un lugar en su casa para recibir a sus comensales. 
Le gusta mucho lo que hace, pues muy rápido se adaptó a este trabajo ya que siempre le gusta cocinar, además de las ventas que tiene puede generarse ingresos. Ahora se siente que tiene muchos clientes y no tiene algunas comodidades como atenderlos así que desea poder ampliar su negocio y crecer. Este será el crédito número 3 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tendrá una poyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio, por su parte ella se compromete a pagar sus cuotas de manera puntual, como en anteriores créditos que tuvo, además esta muy contenta de pertenecer a su banco comunal ya que todos son muy responsables y solidarios. Con el monto solicitado 1000 soles, comprará ingredientes, insumos y utensilios para continuar con su negocio y poder atender bien a sus comensales.
texts.en:
Diana is 39 years old, she is a hard worker and an entrepreneur, She lives with Dedmer, who is 49 years old, and with whom she has two children: Jimena, 14 years old and Herber, 6 years old. Her children are her main motivation to continue working, to provide for them a better quality of life. They live together in their own home, property that they succeeded in buying through much effort and sacrifice. 

Diana works a lot in her business. Three years ago she began working as a street food vendor, but because her necessity increased, she decided to venture into a business with a food stall. For this she bought better ingredients, like fresh meat, tables, chairs and converted part of their home into an area to receive guests. She enjoys what she does and was able to adapt quickly to the work because she has always liked to cook, and with her sales she is able to generate income. Now she has many customers but doesn't have a large enough facility to accommodate all of them. She would like to enlarge her business so it will grow. 

This is the third loan she has taken out with MFP. She is very happy to know that she has financial support because it makes her feel more secure in moving forward with her business. She promises to make her payments punctually, like she has done with the previous loans she has taken out. She is also happy to be a member of her communal bank because everyone is very responsible and united. With the loan amount of 1000 soles, she will buy ingredients, supplies and utensils to continue with her business and be able to serve her guests.

loans.use: to buy raw materials and utensils for the preparation of food.

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en: Fatuma is a 43-year-old single woman. She has four children, and one is enrolled in school. Fatuma operates a fish-selling business and sells her goods at the market. She's worked in this business for 10 years. Her business is located in a shopping center, and her primary customers are neighbors and town dwellers. She describes her greatest business challenge to be competition from other fish sellers in the market. Her highest monthly expense is food and school fees. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Fatuma will use the 50,000-Kenyan-shilling loan to purchase bundles of fish at a wholesale price and resell them at a retail price. Fatuma aspires to expand her business and buy more fish in the future. She joined Yehu to access capital.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of fish at a wholesale price and resell them at a retail price

loans.name: Racheal

texts.en: Racheal is 36 years old and married with four children. She sells flowers to earn a living. She has been in the business for nine years and describes her business environment as good because there is limited competition. Since she joined Faulu Kenya, she has been able to save her income and hopes to be financially stable in the future. She has applied for a loan of 80,000 Kenyan shillings to buy flowers to sell.

loans.use: to buy flowers to sell

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is a 38-year-old businessman in Mariakani. He owns a welding shop, a business he has been doing successfully for the past four years. He is a married father of two.

This is his second borrowing from KADET LTD to finance his business. He plans to purchase a new welding machine and finalize the construction of his house.

He will use the anticipated profits to educate his children. He hopes to have a successful business.

loans.use: to purchase a new welding machine and finalize the construction of his house

loans.name: Luis Alberto

texts.es:
Luis es un hombre de 37 años, el cual es soltero y aún no tiene hijos, es por eso que se dedica actualmente de lleno a su trabajo. Luis disfruta mucho de ver televisión en sus tiempos libres, ya que considera que es un medio que lo ayuda mucho a despejar la mente, como buen ciudadano chinchano disfruta mucho del plato típico de su ciudad “Carapulcra con Sopa Seca”, popularmente conocida a nivel nacional como “Mancha Pecho”.

Luis es jardinero y también se dedica a la venta de platas, se dedica a esta actividad desde las 10 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde, tiempo en el que atiende a 5 clientes aproximadamente, él considera que su negocio tiene éxito por el buen trabajo que realiza y porque se dedica de lleno a la jardinería, actividad que disfruta realizar. 

Luis desea que los prestatarios Kiva puedan apoyarlo y así el realice la compra de más plantas y también mejorar el proceso de crecimiento de las mismas, él sabe con esta nueva inversión podrá tener mayor variedad de producto y como consecuencia podrá generar un mejorado servicio de jardinería. Todas estas nuevas ideas e intenciones lo llevaran a ser un gran empresario enfocado solo a la jardinería.
texts.en:
Luis is a 37-year-old man who is single and as yet has no children; it is for this reason that he now dedicates himself fully to his work. Luis much enjoys watching television in his free time, since he considers that it is a medium that helps him a lot to clear his mind. As a good Chinchano citizen (a citizen of his region), he enjoys "carapulcra con sopa seca,"  a typical dish of his city made with dried potatoes, meat, sauce, pasta, and vegetables, popularly known at a national level as "mancha pecho."

Luis is a gardener, and he also sells plants. He works at this business from 10 in the morning until 6 at night, a time in which he tends to approximately 5 customers. He considers that his business is successful because of the good work that he does and because he dedicates himself fully to gardening, an activity that he enjoys doing.

Luis hopes that the Kiva lenders can help him and he can thus complete the purchase of more plants and also improve their growth process. He knows that with this new investment he will be able to have a greater variety of products and as a consequence he will be able to generate an improved service as a gardener. All these new ideas and intentions will lead him to be a great businessman focused only on gardening.

loans.use: to buy plants.

loans.name: Dorcas

texts.en:
Dorcas is a 34-year-old mother of three children aged thirteen, seven and three years. She sells second hand clothes that earns her a monthly income of KES 15,000. She has been in this business for two years. 

She has applied for a loan of KES 30,000 to purchase more shirts, T-shirts, trousers, jackets and shorts to boost her business.

The profit she makes from the business would help her construct rental houses on her plot. Her dream is to ensure that her family moves to another level and meet her needs without straining.

loans.use: To buy more shirts, T-shirts, trousers, jackets and shorts.

loans.name: Mwanarusi

texts.en: Mwanarusi is a widowed woman. She has 5 children. Mwanarusi operates a cashew-nut-selling business and sells her goods from home. She has worked in this business for 10 years. Her primary customers are her neighbors. She describes her greatest business challenge as seasonality and her highest monthly expense as food for her family. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. Mwanarusi will use the KES 30,000 loan to purchase more stock of cashew nuts for resale. Mwanarusi aspires to expand her business in the future. She joined Yehu because it offers quality financial services.

loans.use: To purchase more cashew nuts for resale.

loans.name: Guadalupe

texts.es: Guadalupe se acerca a la institución solicitando su primer crédito ya que  desea  hacer  crecer  su  negocio, actualmente  ella  se   dedica  a la  venta  de  persianas , esto le a  permitido   salir adelante   día  con  día,  nos  comenta  que  ella  hace  pedidos  a la ciudad  de  Monclova  ya  que  adquiere el  producto a  un precio  mas  bajo,  es  por  ello  que  en  esta  ocasión  necesita  de  nuestro  apoyo para  realizar  la compra  de  persianas  ya  que  su  numero de  clientes   a  aumentado considerablemente,  ella  esta  muy contenta  de  habernos  encontrado  ya que  podrá  realizar  su  proyecto  y esto le  permitirá   generar  mayores  ingresos.
texts.en: Guadalupe came to the institution to ask for her first loan because she wants to grow her business. Right now she sells curtains, which allows her to get by day to day. She tells us that she makes purchases in the city of Monclova because she can get her products at a better price. On this occasion she needs our support to be able to buy curtains because her customer base has increased considerably. She is very happy to have found us because she will be able to do her job and this will generate more income.

loans.use: to buy curtains for resale.

loans.name: Maria De Lourdes

texts.es:
La señora Maria De Lourdes esta solicitando un préstamo para comprar el vitropiso que le esta haciendo falta a su vivienda. Así tendrá mayor comodidad en su hogar ya que en la comunidad donde viven las calles están en muy malas condiciones y con la instalación del vitropiso, se protegerán de enfermedades. 
La señora Maria de Lourdes cuneta con un pequeño negocio, el cual aporta la ganancia para el mejoramiento de su vivienda. Su esposo el señor Víctor Manuel trabaja en una compañía de gasolinera desde hace siete años, como despachador y cuenta con tres hijos que están estudiando para tener un mejor futuro. 
Desean mejorar el patrimonio y la calidad de vida de su familia.
texts.en:
Señora Maria de Lourdes is applying for a loan to buy the ceramic floor which her house is lacking. Thus she will have greater comfort in her home, since in the community where they live, the streets are in very bad condition, and with the installation of the ceramic floor, they will be protected from illnesses.

Señora Maria de Lourdes has a little business which contributes earnings for the improvement of her house. Her husband, Señor Victor Manuel, has worked for a petrol station company for seven years as dispatcher. She has three children who are in school, studying to have a better future.

They want to improve the assets and the quality of life of their family.

loans.use: to buy a ceramic floor and pay for the installation.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy shoes, blouses, sport shirts, underwear, and brassieres

loans.name: Esther

texts.es:
La señora Esther ya ha tenido tres créditos en KIVA los cuales los a pagado puntual mente. Esta solicitando un préstamo para invertir en comprar de mercancía y tener mayor surtido en su negocio y que tendrá mayo productos para ofrecer a sus clientes ya que en la colonia donde esta ubicado su negocio solo esta ella.
Doña Esther cuenta con un ingreso extra que es la venta de productos de belleza por catalogó, también con el ingreso de su esposo del señor José Fidel se dedica mantenimientos de pintura para carros. Cuentan con dos hijos pequeños de edad escolar. Con estos ingresos planean darle lo mejor y los estudia necesarios para su futuro, también planean pagar el crédito.
texts.en:
Esther has already had 3 Kiva loans which she has paid back on time. She is asking for a loan to buy merchandise so her store will be better stocked and so she can offer her customers more products because her store is the only one in the neighborhood.

Esther makes additional income from selling catalog beauty products, as well as the income that her husband, Jose Fidel, makes by painting cars. They have two young, school-aged children. With these income sources they plan to give their kids the best and educate them for their future. They also plan to use this income to pay back the loan.

loans.use: to buy merchandise for her grocery store.

loans.name: Osman Adilson

texts.es:
Osman, se ha decidido por solicitar un nuevo préstamo, el cual utilizara para pagar el alquiler de terreno donde iniciara el cultivo de maíz, así es como siempre estos préstamos le ayudan a facilitarle el trabajo en la agricultura, él tuvo un efecto positivo con la inversión del préstamo anterior, pero algunos problemas inesperados le ocasionaron un atraso, espera que este nuevo sea de igual manera provechoso para el cultivo y para su propia vida.
El atraso que tuvo Osman, no le permitio tener el credito republicado para esta fecha.
texts.en:
